SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class is responsible for managing the game logic and interactions between players and the game model. It maintains the list of players, clients, and handles the game chat functionality.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameController()
    Constructs a new GameController and initializes the game model, player list, client list, and chat instance.

    • GameController

      public GameController()
      Constructs a new GameController and initializes the game model, player list, client list, and chat instance.

  • Method Details

    • reconnection

      public void reconnection(String nickname, VirtualView oldVirtualView, VirtualView newVirtualView) throws RemoteException
      Handles the reconnection of a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player who is reconnecting.
      oldVirtualView - The old VirtualView associated with the player.
      newVirtualView - The new VirtualView associated with the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs during the reconnection process.

    • setStarterCardSide

      public void setStarterCardSide(String playerName, boolean front) throws RemoteException
      Sets the starter card side for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player setting their starter card.
      front - True if the front side of the card should be used, false if the back side should be used.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs while setting the starter card.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player p, VirtualView v) throws RemoteException
      Adds a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      p - The player to be added.
      v - The VirtualView associated with the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs while adding the player.

    • placeCard

      public boolean placeCard(String playerName, int cardIndex, boolean side, int row, int column) throws RemoteException
      Places a card on the game playground for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player placing the card.
      cardIndex - The index of the card to be placed.
      side - True if the front side of the card should be used, false if the back side should be used.
      row - The row on the board where the card should be placed.
      column - The column on the board where the card should be placed.
      Returns:
      True if the card was successfully placed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs during the card placement.

    • drawCard

      public boolean drawCard(String playerName, int index) throws RemoteException
      Draws a card for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player drawing the card.
      index - The index of the card to be drawn.
      Returns:
      True if the card was successfully drawn, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs during the card drawing.

    • disconnection

      public void disconnection(String playerName) throws RemoteException
      Handles the disconnection of a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player who is disconnecting.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs during the disconnection process.

    • setSecretAchievement

      public void setSecretAchievement(String playerName, AchievementCard achievement) throws RemoteException
      Sets the secret achievement card for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player setting their secret achievement.
      achievement - The secret achievement card to be set.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs while setting the secret achievement.

    • calculateEndPoints

      public boolean calculateEndPoints() throws RemoteException
      Calculates the end points for the game and advances the game state.
      Returns:
      True if the end points were successfully calculated and the game state advanced, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs during the calculation.

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets the list of players in the game.
      Returns:
      The list of players.

    • sendChatMessage

      public Message sendChatMessage(Message msg)
      Sends a chat message and returns the last message sent in the chat.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to be sent.
      Returns:
      The last message sent in the chat.

    • getWholeChat

      public ArrayList<Message> getWholeChat()
      Gets the entire chat history.
      Returns:
      The list of all messages in the chat.

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(int playersNumber)
      Sets the number of players for the game and initializes the start countdown.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - The number of players to be set.
